title: To Kill a Mockingbird

summary: A powerful story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

author: George Orwell
summary: A chilling depiction of totalitarianism, surveillance, and loss of freedom.

summary: Two teenagers with cancer embark on a heartbreaking, beautiful journey.

summary: The former First Lady reflects on her life and journey.
